Constructor Detail

BackupManager

public BackupManager()
Method Detail

backupDB

public static java.lang.String backupDB(BackupManager.BackupType type)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Computes and stores the backup for the specified DB. This may either be serialized DB file or a zipped diagnostic feedback file. Returns the backup file (which will be located in the backup directory). If backupType does not refer to a DB backup (but e.g. the DiagnosticFeedback type) an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
type - type of the backup
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

backupDBs

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> backupDBs()
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
Stores a serialized version of all backupable DBs (including context information). Returns the list of created backup files as return value.

Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - in case something serious goes wrong

restoreDBBackup

public static boolean restoreDBBackup(java.lang.String backupFile)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Restores a backup to the associated directory. The repository content will be completely replaced by the backup content.

Parameters:
rep -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - describing error in case restore fails

restoreLatestDBBackup

public static java.lang.String restoreLatestDBBackup(BackupManager.BackupType bt)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
Restores the latest backup of the given type.

Returns:
name of the restored backup file or null if no backup available
Throws:
exception - in case something goes wrong
java.lang.Exception

name of the restored backup file or null if no backup available

java.lang.Exception

getAvailableBackups

public static java.util.SortedSet<java.lang.String> getAvailableBackups()
Retrieves a lexigrophically sorted set of available backups. As we use the naming scheme - and a lexicographically sortable timestamp, this list reflects the order of backups.

deleteBackup

public static void deleteBackup(java.lang.String backupFile)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Remove the specified backup from the list of backups.

Parameters:
backupFile -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

deleteBackupsOlderThan

public static int deleteBackupsOlderThan(int nrOfDays)
Deletes all backups older than nrOfDays days. If nrOfDays is <=0, all backups will be removed. Returns the total number of backups that have been deleted.

Parameters:
nrOfDays -
Returns:
number of deleted backups

resolveBackupType

public static BackupManager.BackupType resolveBackupType(java.lang.String backupTypeStr)
Resolves a backup type string to an enum element.

isDBBackup

public static boolean isDBBackup(BackupManager.BackupType t)
Checks if the backup type is a datatbase backup (currently, if not it means it is a diagnostic feedback file, but in future there might be other backup types that are not DB backups).

Parameters:
t -
Returns:

parseFilename

public static com.fluidops.util.Pair<java.util.Date,BackupManager.BackupType> parseFilename(java.lang.String file)
                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Parse the file, throws an exception if file naming scheme is invalid. If no exception occurs, the metod returns the date and the backup type represented by the filename (and both are definitely set).

Parameters:
file -
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

createDiagnosticFeedback

public static com.fluidops.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> createDiagnosticFeedback(boolean includeGlobalDB,
                                                                                                  boolean includeHistoryDB,
                                                                                                  boolean includeWiki,
                                                                                                  boolean ignore,
                                                                                                  boolean includeConfigPropDB,
                                                                                                  boolean includeConfigFolder,
                                                                                                  boolean includeUploadFolder)
Creates diagnostic feedback zip file using best effort approach. The boolean parameters can be used to include/exclude individual components from the diagnostic feedback. The method returns the a pair of the zip-file and a flag being set to false if one or more specified subtasks did not succeed, true otherwise.
